detaileddescription.para:
ptr
TSW peripheral base address
port
TSW port number
speed
Pointer to MAC address
itf
Promiscuous Mode: Set true to enable; set false to disable
tx_dly
Tx delay
rx_dlay
Rx delay
speed: 00 1000mbps, 11 100mbps, 10 10mpbs itf: 000 MII; 001 RGMII; 100 RMII
